import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './FormProduct.css' import { BiX } from "react-icons/bi"; import { BiCheck } from "react-icons/bi"; import Input from './formInput' const FormProduct = () => { const[titulo, setTitulo] = useState({campo:'',valido:null}) const[precio, setPrecio] = useState({campo:'',valido:null}) const[size, setSize] = useState({campo:'',valido:null}) const[validarForm, SetvalidarForm] = useState(null) const expre = /^[a-zA-ZÀ-ÿ\s]{1,40}$/ const onSubmit= (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); if(titulo.valido === 'true' && precio.valido === 'true' && size.valido === 'true'){ SetvalidarForm(true) }else{ SetvalidarForm(false) } } return (
